Smart Coat Rack: A smart coat rack with sensors that can detect when a coat is hanging and send a notification to your phone to remind you to take it with you when you leave.
Self-Cleaning Coat Rack: A coat rack with a built-in cleaning system that uses UV light or ozone to kill germs and bacteria on the coat hangers.
Multi-Functional Coat Rack: A coat rack that doubles as a shelf or a storage unit for shoes, bags, and other accessories.
Adjustable Height Coat Rack: A coat rack with adjustable height hooks that can accommodate coats of different lengths.
Wireless Charging Coat Rack: A coat rack with built-in wireless charging pads for your phone or other devices.
